name: Additive CNS depression with multiple sedating drugs
actions: Limit concurrent use of multiple sedating medications when possible.
Counsel regarding sedation, falls, and impaired cognition.
Use extra caution in older adults or those with respiratory risk.

rationale: Both drugs contribute to CNS depression.
Combined sedation increases fall and respiratory depression risk.

explanation_template: {A_name} and {B_name} both contribute to CNS depression. Together they can significantly increase sedation and impairment risk.

references.citation: PD stacking: additive CNS depressant effects increase harm risk.
